summary: WEST AFRICA 1869 - Slave trade is illegal. There is a revolt on a slave ship - twenty four men fight for their lives. Out-gunned, the revolt fails but a second uprising is planned.
cast: Djimon Hounsou|Akosua Busia|De'aundre Bonds|Eartha Kitt|Reg E. Cathey|Tom Fitzpatrick|Mario Gardner|Clabe Hartley|Jamillah Nicole|Tom Taglang|Tony Torn|Peter Navy Tuiasosopo|Claudia Robinson|Tamael|Glen Beaudin|Jon Amirkhan|Brye Cooper|Smalls
title: Ill Gotten Gains
